tips.too_short: Add one value line and a clarifying question.
tips.no_question: End with a clarifying question to show care.
tips.aggressive: Soften tone: “I understand…” then return to value.
tips.offtopic: Gently steer back to the gift goal.
tips.no_value: Add how this gift makes the moment special.
tips.price_push_hard: Don’t push price — value first, then options.
tips.weak_payment_path: Explain payment steps calmly and give a choice.
